statements: UPDATE ProductDemandAnalysis SET quantity_ordered = 1000 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductDemandAnalysis SET customer_name = 'John Doe', quantity_ordered = 500 WHERE product_id = 2;

UPDATE ProductDemandAnalysis SET order_date = '2022-09-15', quantity_ordered = 20 WHERE product_id = 102 AND customer_name = 'Jane Smith'

UPDATE orders SET quantity = 10, order_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE order_id = 5;
